Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI

Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GuiController
public class GuiController
extends ClientController
The GUI Controller which handles all messages and errors.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GuiController​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, Gui gui)
    Instantiates a new Gui controller with the given stage, also adds a font and the different phase handlers.

    • sendBuyProductionCard

      public void sendBuyProductionCard​(int cardId, int stack, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> leaderIds, ResourcesWallet wallet)
      Sends the buy production card message to the server, specifying the stack (1-3) where it will be placed, the card being bought, the leaderCards used for a potential discount and the resources used to pay for the card.
      Parameters:
      cardId - the if of the card being bought
      stack - the stack where the card will be placed
      leaderIds - the ids of the leaders used for the discount
      wallet - the wallet containing the resources used to pay for the card, and where they come from

    • getAvailableProductionCards

      public java.util.List<ConcreteProductionCard> getAvailableProductionCards()
      Gets all the available production cards to purchase.
      Returns:
      the list of all available production cards

    • sendProductionMessage

      public void sendProductionMessage​(java.util.List<ConcreteProductionCard> prodCards, ResourcesWallet resWal, java.util.List<BoostAbility> leaderCards, java.util.List<Resource> leaderOutputs, boolean basicProd, Resource basicOutput)
      Sends the production message to the server, specifying the cards being used, the resources being used, the leader cards of the BoostAbility type, the leaderCard outputs chosen, basic production and if so the resource the player desires from it.
      Parameters:
      prodCards - the production cards being used
      resWal - the resource wallet containing resource and placement
      leaderCards - the leader cards used to boost output
      leaderOutputs - the leader outputs being boosted
      basicProd - if basic production is chosen or not
      basicOutput - the output chosen by the player of the eventual basic production
